title.rendered: Zeni Side Chair – internal steel structure – Stock

content.rendered:
The Zeni Side Chair is comfortable, well proportioned and beautifully designed chair. We also offer the Zeni Armchair as well as the Zeni Grande Armchair for those who prefer larger proportioned seating.

We are pleased to hold the above finishes in stock!

Made with a solid steel internal leg structure for total support, stability and longevity; surrounded by a beech frame.

The Zeni can be upholstered in any material (Customers Own Material, also known as COM), but comes as standard in a wide selection of faux leathers. For the customisable version of the Zeni (CHDI0460), please click here.

2 year structural warranty. Made in Europe.
